title: Saar Biotech - PCM + CPM + Phenylephrine HCL Suspension|Contract Manufacturing Company Pharmaceuticals
meta: Saar Biotech is a pharmaceutical company which is situated in Himachal Pradesh(Baddi).The combination of  PCM + CPM + Phenylephrine HCL Suspension is used for the relief of clogged nose, runny nose, postnasal drip, itchy and watery eyes, sneezing, headache, body aches and fever associated with the common cold, allergic rhinitis, sinusitis, flu and other minor respiratory tract infections. It also helps decongest sinus openings and passages.

PARACETAMOL, phenylephrine hydrochloride, CHOLPHENIRAMINE MALEATE, pcm, cpm, acetaminophen, 125mg, 2.5mg, 2.5mg, 125, mg, 2.5, headache, sinus congestion, nasal congestion, runny nose, sneezing, minor aches and pains, reduces, swelling, decongest, pharmacology, pharmacodynamics, phamacopeia, pharmaceutical, third, party, maufacturers, manufacturing, contract, ethical, generic, third, prty, party, baddi, badi, excis, free, zone, anti, cold, histamine, ip, i.p, blockages, drug, interaction, india, himachal, pradesh, h.p, hp, PCM, CPM, HCL, PHENYLEPHRINE
name: Paracetamol,Chlorpheniramine &  Phenylephrine Suspension
